channel.title: What is the most popular 2006 server?
channel.description: I just started today, and I can not promise that I will be able to connect to any server. While scrolling through the rs2 ads I came across a post about mentioning a server that is very popular and with a talented developer/programer. I want to know which server it is.

item.title: What is the most popular 2006 server?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“RS PS, post:17, topic:477903”]Currently David’s 2006 Reamke.

But Soulsplit’s remake shall be the best IMO.[/quote]
All of these servers that are making remakes in an attempt to attract more players need to stop.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the most popular 2006 server?

item.title: What is the most popular 2006 server?

But Soulsplit’s remake shall be the best IMO.

item.title: What is the most popular 2006 server?
item.dc:creator: @Beast1233 Beast1233
item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

Just to note, I will also gladly take a server that is a 05 or 04 remake, not that I expect in the least bit that any exist. Same requirements as before, same exact xp rate, ect.

Is there even any servers at all where xp is not accelerated past the normal amount? I have yet to find a single one, and its getting on my nerves.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the most popular 2006 server?

lol nobody want to play a f2p2006 server, or make a f2p2006 server with 711 items lol

item.description:

Doobage:

Yeah RuneRebels seems to be the best coded atm, but David’s is the most populated.

So currently there is no servers for what I am looking for as of this time?

item.title: What is the most popular 2006 server?
item.dc:creator: @Beast1233 Beast1233
item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

May I get a link to davids server? Also been looking around for servers for the last few hours, specifically 2006 remake servers and I have tried dozens of them. None of them I like. They always start you out with equipment and money and the xp rate is accelerated. I don’t want that. I want to be challenged like I was when I first played runescape whilst feeling nostalgia.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the most popular 2006 server?

item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails

that would be david’s server, brother.

item.description:
@Beast1233 wrote:

I am mainly hoping for a server that has all or nearly all the correct features of runecsape back in 06 with no or few bugs to speak of. That all may be a long shot though.

Read full topic
